payload.content: Deepagents is an open-source agent harness developed by LangChain.

name: Deepagents is an open-source agent harness developed by LangChain.
content: Deepagents is an open-source agent harness developed by LangChain.

payload.content: Deepagents incorporates common principles found in popular agents like Claude Code and Manus, including planning before task execution, computer access (shell and filesystem), and sub-agent delegation for isolated task execution.

name: Deepagents incorporates common principles found in popular agents like Claude Co
content: Deepagents incorporates common principles found in popular agents like Claude Code and Manus, including planning before task execution, computer access (shell and filesystem), and sub-agent delegation for isolated task execution.

payload.content: A new repository of quickstarts demonstrates how different agents can be configured using the Deepagents harness.

name: A new repository of quickstarts demonstrates how different agents can be configu
content: A new repository of quickstarts demonstrates how different agents can be configured using the Deepagents harness.
